title: Generalised Linear Models
toc:
1. 指数族分布与泊松回归
    1. Exponential Family of Distributions (指数族分布)
    2. Generalised Linear Models
    3. Maximum Likelihood Estimation of GLM Coefficients
    4. Deviance
      1. Hypothesis testing
  2. Models for binary/binomial response – Logistic 回归
    1. 交互项
    2. 模型选择
    3. 回归方程
    4. 估算分位数
    5. 胜算比 (Odds Ratio, OR)
    6. 模型的拟合优度 (Goodness of Fit)
      1. 残差偏差 (Residual Deviance)
      2. AIC
      3. Observed Values vs. Fitted Values
      4. Hosmer-Lemeshow 拟合优度检验 (Optional)
      5. ROC (Receiver Operating Characteristic) 曲线 (Optional)
  3. Models for count responses – Poisson 回归
    1. 泊松回归中的偏置项 (Offset)
    2. R Output
    3. 最优模型选择
    4. 过度离散 (Overdispersion)
  4. 考试大纲
    1. Part 1 – 指数族分布
    2. Part 2 – Logistic 回归
    3. Part 3 – Poisson 回归

author.name: 王观旭
author.description:
真理所在之处，数学生生不息。

The learning materials throughout my life.
